channel.title: Apache Camel security information on Apache Camel
channel.description: Recent content in Apache Camel security information on Apache Camel

item.title: Apache Camel Security Advisory - CVE-2019-0188
item.description: Apache Camel-XMLJson vulnerable to XML external entity injection (XXE)

item.title: Apache Camel Security Advisory - CVE-2019-0194
item.description: Apache Camel’s File is vulnerable to directory traversal

item.title: Apache Camel Security Advisory - CVE-2018-8041
item.description: Apache Camel’s Mail is vulnerable to path traversal

item.title: Apache Camel Security Advisory - CVE-2018-8027
item.description: Apache Camel’s Core is vulnerable to XXE in XSD validation processor

item.title: Apache Camel Security Advisory - CVE-2017-12633
item.description: Apache Camel’s Hessian unmarshalling operation is vulnerable to Remote Code Execution attacks

item.title: Apache Camel Security Advisory - CVE-2017-12634
item.description: Apache Camel’s Castor unmarshalling operation is vulnerable to Remote Code Execution attacks

item.title: Apache Camel Security Advisory - CVE-2016-8749
item.description: Apache Camel’s Jackson and JacksonXML unmarshalling operation are vulnerable to Remote Code Execution attacks

item.title: Apache Camel Security Advisory - CVE-2017-5643
item.description: Apache Camel’s Validation Component is vulnerable against SSRF via remote DTDs and XXE

item.title: Apache Camel Security Advisory - CVE-2017-3159
item.description: Apache Camel’s Snakeyaml unmarshalling operation is vulnerable to Remote Code Execution attacks

item.title: Apache Camel Security Advisory - CVE-2015-5348
item.description: Apache Camel’s Jetty/Servlet usage is vulnerable to Java object de-serialisation vulnerability.

item.title: Apache Camel Security Advisory - CVE-2015-5344
item.description: Apache Camel’s XStream usage is vulnerable to Remote Code Execution attacks.

item.title: Apache Camel Security Advisory - CVE-2015-0264
item.description: The XPath handling in Apache Camel for invalid XML Strings or invalid XML GenericFile objects allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via an XML External Entity (XXE) declaration. The XML External Entity (XXE) will be resolved before the Exception is thrown.

item.title: Apache Camel Security Advisory - CVE-2015-0263
item.description: The XML converter setup in Apache Camel allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via an SAXSource containing an XML External Entity (XXE) declaration.

item.title: Apache Camel Security Advisory - CVE-2014-0002
item.description: The Apache Camel XSLT component will resolve entities in XML messages when transforming them using an xslt route.

item.title: Apache Camel Security Advisory - CVE-2014-0003
item.description: The Apache Camel XSLT component allows XSL stylesheets to perform calls to external Java methods.

item.title: Apache Camel Security Advisory - CVE-2013-4330
item.description: Writing files using FILE or FTP components, can potentially be exploited by a malicious user.
